scripts.build-android: npm run clean-android && npm run clean-npm && npm i && npm run android
scripts.build-ios: npm run clean-ios && npm run clean-npm && npm i && npm run install-ios && npm run ios-ipad
scripts.ios-prod: npm run ios-ipad-prod && npm run ios-iphone-prod
scripts.clean-npm: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm run clean-coco
scripts.clean-android: npm run watch-del && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && cd../ && rm -rf android/app/build
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.debug-build: cd android && gradlew.bat bundleDebug && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && cd ../
scripts.clear-branches: git branch | grep -v 'develop' | grep -v 'master' | grep -v 'main' | grep -v 'release' | xargs git branch -D
scripts.gen-android-prod-jks: cd android/app && keytool -genkeypair -v -storetype PKCS12 -keystore newProduction.keystore -alias newProduction -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && cd ../../
